decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Unnumbered Design Layout Plan,  Design & Access Statement, Unnumbered Site Location Plan, Unnumbered Block Plan Received: 09 June 2014 Unnumbered Design Layout Plan Received: 16 June 2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used outside of the following times Monday and Tuesday 08:30 - 20:00, Wednesday and Friday 08:30 - 18:30 and 08:30 - 18:45 on Thursdays without prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall not be used for purposes other than uses ancillary to the main use of the building as D1 (doctor's surgery) and patrons will not be permitted to wait in the garden
description: Erection of a single storey detached timber outbuilding for use as a counselling room to the existing doctor's practice (Use Class D1).
